competitors.name: Runbook
competitors.notes: European competitor, acquired by BlackLine in 2016 for $34M

competitors.name: Trintech
competitors.notes: Founded 1987, established financial close and reconciliation player

competitors.name: Workiva
competitors.notes: Founded 2008, financial reporting and compliance automation

competitors.name: Oracle Cloud EPM
competitors.notes: ERP vendor with integrated financial management

competitors.name: SAP
competitors.notes: Major ERP with financial close capabilities

competitors.name: NetSuite
competitors.notes: Cloud ERP with Advanced Financial Close

context: By 2015, BlackLine had $200M+ from Silver Lake Partners (2013). Formed strategic alliance with McGladrey for BPaaS. Market maturing with pure-play vendors and ERP providers competing. Positioning for October 2016 IPO.
